channel.title: Project Exctacy
channel.description:
[center]What is Project Exctacy?
[ul][li]Well, we are a newly started delta by two members on Moparscape.[/li] [li]Well, What are their names?[/li] [li]Frank(Kronixz) and Zach(Xellium)[/li] [li]What do they plan on accomplishing?[/li] [li]We plan on completely rebuilding a Delta from top to bottom.[/li][/ul] [/center]
[Center] [size=15pt][s][u][b]Skills:[/b][/u][/s][/size] [left]
[ul][li][u][b]Runecrafting:[/b][/u][/li] [li][color=red]All Runes[/li] [li][color=red]Working Pouches![/li] [li][color=red]The Abyss![/li] [li][color=red]Multiple Runes[/li]
[li][u][b]Farming:[/b][/u][/li] [li][color=red]Allotments[/li] [li][color=red]Raking[/li] [li][color=red]Plant Growth Time[/li] [li][color=red]Tree's[/li] [li][color=red]Herbs[/li] [li][color=red]Flowers[/li] [li][color=red]Mithril Seeds[/li] [li][color=red]Working Magic Secateurs[/li] [li][color=red]Diseased Plants[/li] [li][color=red]One Farming Superstore[/li]
[li][u][b]Slayer[/b][/u][/li] [li][color=red]All Slayer Monsters prior 2009[/li] [li][color=red]Full Operational Slayer Tower[/li] [li][color=red]Enchanted Gem[/li] [li][color=red]Multiple Slayer Bosses in their original locations[/li]
[li][u][b]Agility[/b][/u][/li] [li][color=red]Ape Atoll, Brimhaven, Gnome, Wildy Agility Courses[/li] [li][color=red]Full Agile[/li] [li][color=red]Right GFX working.[/li]
[li][u][b]Theiving[/b][/u][/li] [li][color=red]Stalls[/li] [li][color=red]Npc Pickpocketing[/li]
[li][u][b]Fletching[/b][/u][/li] [li][color=red]All Logs[/li] [li][color=red]Stringing Bows[/li]
[li][u][b]Herblore[/b][/u][/li] [li][color=red]Identify Herbs[/li] [li][color=red]Quest to Start Herblore[/li] [li][color=red]Extremes and Overload[/li] [li][color=red]Finished and Unfinished Potions[/li]
[li][u][b]Fishing[/b][/u][/li] [li][color=red]All fishes][/li] [li][color=red]Fishing Guild[/li] [li][color=red]Random Spots Changing[/li] [li][color=red]Fishing Trawler[/li] [li][color=red]Living Minerals Cavern[/li]
[li][u][b]Cooking[/b][/u][/li] [li][color=red]All Food Available[/li] [li][color=red]Rogues Den[/li] [li][color=red]Food Burning[/li] [li][color=red]Cooking on a Fire[/li] [li][color=red]Cooking Gauntlets[/li]
[li][u][b]Woodcutting[/b][/u][/li] [li][color=green]All Trees Cut-able[/li] [li][color=red]Re spawning Trees[/li] [li][color=red]Bird Nests[/li] [li][color=green]All Axes[/li] [li][color=red]Inferno Adze working[/li]
[li][u][b]Firemaking[/b][/u][/li] [li][color=red]All Fired Up[/li] [li][color=red]All Logs Burnable[/li] [li][color=red]Ashes Dropped[/li] [li][color=red]Inferno Adze, burns as you cut wood[/li]
[li][u][b]Crafting[/b][/u][/li] [li][color=red]Flax to Bowstrings[/li] [li][color=red]All Gems[/li] [li][color=orange]Leather Crafting[/li] [li][color=red]Dragon Leather Crafting[/li] [li][color=red]Jewelry[/li]
[li][u][b]Mining[/b][/u][/li] [li][color=red]All Ores[/li] [li][color=red]Ores Re spawning[/li] [li][color=red]All Pickaxes[/li] [li][color=red]Inferno Adze[/li]
[li][u][b]Smithing[/b][/u][/li] [li][color=red]All Bars Smith-Able[/li] [li][color=red]All Amours[/li] [li][color=red]Dragon Ore, and Dragon Bar[/li] [li][color=red]50% Chance on Iron Bars[/li] [li][color=red]Ring of forging[/li]
[li][u][b]Combat[/b][/u][/li] [li][color=red]All Npc's Attackable[/li] [li][color=red]Full God Wars[/li] [li][color=red]Custom Whips[/li] [li][color=green]All Spirit Shields[/li] [li][color=orange]New Models for Weapons[/li] [li][color=orange]Perfect Special Attacks[/li][/ul]
MORE WILL BE ADDED LATER!
PICS coming soon.
Support:
Thanks to:
Spades - Source Pblord7 - Client Lorenzo - Being Very Helpful Mopar - Tuts and stuff
[/left]

item.title: Project Exctacy
item.dc:creator: @Xellium Xellium
item.description:
@Xellium wrote:

[quote=“Pblord7, post:6, topic:437306”][quote author=g0d of war1 link=topic=540015.msg3953958#msg3953958 date=1332561564]

Taking my client you nub :rolleyes: , I’ll sell you some of these features XD

Your client is bad anyway

Goodluck with this project

[/quote][/quote]

To be honest. I was just to lazy to add all of the spirit shields and chaotics you already had added.

Read full topic
